Literature.Title: Influence of Short Cationic Lipopeptides with Fatty Acids of Different Chain Lengths on Bacterial Biofilms Formed on Polystyrene and Hydrogel Surfaces.
Literature.Author: Paduszynska MA, Maciejewska M, Neubauer D, Golacki K, Szymukowicz M, Bauer M, Kamysz W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAP 0017(MIC=2µg/ml),Candida albicans 105(MIC=16µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes(MIC=<1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9029(MIC=128µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis PCM 543(MIC=512µg/ml)
